comments.body: A cursory glance at the first line of the main file of the package shows that the `agora-rtc-sdk` is a UMD module and can be loaded either via a global when run as a script on the web, or via `import` or `require`. This change makes it a global only and prevents it from being loaded as a module. It is possible this could break other callers.
My fault. I will fix this. Thanks a lot.
